titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C30

availability.licence: Distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License

body.ab:
<lb n="c57-0147__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0147.07" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 17<lb n="c57-0147__main__2"/>It
was eight
o'clock
when we landed; we <lb n="c57-0147__main__3"/>walked
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>for
a short time on the
shore
enjoying the transitory
<lb n="c57-0147__main__4"/>twilight
& then retired
to
the
Inn
and contem<lb n="c57-0147__main__5"/>plated the lovely scene of waters,
mountains
<lb n="c57-0147__main__6"/>&
woods
obscured in
darkness
yet still
allow<lb n="c57-0147__main__7"/>ing<lb n="c57-0147__left_margin__1"/>displaying their<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24387__Start"/>their<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24387__End"/><del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24392__Start"/>dark<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24392__End"/>black outlines– The wind
which <lb n="c57-0147__main__8"/>had fallen in the
south
now rose with great <lb n="c57-0147__main__9"/>violence in the
west—the
moon had <lb n="c57-0147__main__10"/>reached her summit in the
heavens
<lb n="c57-0147__main__11"/>& was beginning to
descend
the clouds <lb n="c57-0147__main__12"/>swept across it swifter than the <lb n="c57-0147__main__13"/>flight of the
vulture
and dimmed her
<lb n="c57-0147__main__14"/>rays
while the lake reflected the
scene<lb n="c57-0147__main__15"/>of
the busy
heavens <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> made
still busier by the
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>restless
waves <lb n="c57-0147__main__16"/>that were beginning to
rise—
Suddenly <lb n="c57-0147__main__17"/>a heavy storm of rain
descended.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0147__main__18"/>I<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24457__Start"/>t<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24457__End"/>
had been calm during the
day
but
<lb n="c57-0147__main__19"/><del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24463__Start"/>now<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24463__End"/>so
soon as night
<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24470__Start"/>ha<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24470__End"/>
obscured the shapes of
<lb n="c57-0147__main__20"/>objects
a thousand fears arose in <lb n="c57-0147__main__21"/>my
mind –
I was anxious and
watchful
<lb n="c57-0147__main__22"/>while my right hand grasped a pistol <lb n="c57-0147__main__23"/>which was hidden in my
bosom —
<lb n="c57-0147__main__24"/>Every sound terrified
me,
but I
resoldved
<lb n="c57-0147__main__25"/>that I would sell
my<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24490__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24490__End"/>
life
dearly &<lb n="c57-0147__main__26"/>not <del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24497__Start"/>die<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24497__End"/>relax
the
conflict
that impended untill
<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24504__Start"/>my
adversary<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24504__End"/><del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24507__Start"/>lay<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24507__End"/><del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24510__Start"/>at my<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24510__End"/><del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24513__Start"/>should lie senseless<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24513__End"/><lb n="c57-0147__main__27"/><del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24518__Start"/>fee<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24518__End"/><del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24520__Start"/>t.<del loc="c57-0147__main__d1e24520__End"/>my
own life, or that of my
adversary
were
extinguished<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0147__main__28"/>Elizabeth
observed my agitation for <lb n="c57-0147__main__29"/>some time in timid & fearful
silence
<lb n="c57-0147__main__30"/>At length
she said — What is it, my dear <lb n="c57-0147__main__31"/>Victor,
that agitates
you?
What is it <lb n="c57-0147__main__32"/>you
fear?<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0147__main__33"/>Oh
peace, peace, my
love, I replied, <lb n="c57-0147__main__34"/>this night
and all will be
safe –
but <lb n="c57-0147__main__35"/>this night is
dreadful
very
dreadful.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0148__main__1"/>I
passed an hour in this state of
<lb n="c57-0148__main__2"/>mind
when suddenly I reflected how
dreadful
<lb n="c57-0148__main__3"/><del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24566__Start"/>such a<del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24566__End"/>the
combat which I
momently
expected
<del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24585__Start"/>would<del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24585__End"/>to take <lb n="c57-0148__main__4"/>place
would be to my
wife
and I earnestly <lb n="c57-0148__main__5"/>entreated her to
retire –
resolving not to join <lb n="c57-0148__main__6"/>her
untill
I had obtained some knowledge <lb n="c57-0148__main__7"/>as to the situation of my enemy.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0148__main__8"/>She left
me
and I continued some <lb n="c57-0148__main__9"/>time walking up and down the passages <lb n="c57-0148__main__10"/>of the
house
& inspecting every corner <lb n="c57-0148__main__11"/>that might afford a retreat to my
<lb n="c57-0148__main__12"/>adversary –
But I
<del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24617__Start"/>sa<del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24617__End"/> saw
no trace of
him&<lb n="c57-0148__main__13"/><lb n="c57-0148__left_margin__1"/>was
beginning to
consider <del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24638__Start"/>what was my best<del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24638__End"/>that
some fortunate
chance<lb n="c57-0148__main__14"/><del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24644__Start"/>mode of proceeding<del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24644__End"/>had
intervened to prevent the execution of his
menace, –
When suddenly <lb n="c57-0148__main__15"/>I heard a shrill & dreadful
scream.–
<lb n="c57-0148__main__16"/>It came from the room into which <lb n="c57-0148__main__17"/>Elizabeth had
retired.<del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24662__Start"/>with a servant<del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24662__End"/><lb n="c57-0148__main__18"/>As
I heard
it
the whole truth rushed
<lb n="c57-0148__main__19"/>to
my
mind
my arms
dropped –
the <lb n="c57-0148__main__20"/>motion of every muscle & fibre was
<lb n="c57-0148__main__21"/>suspended
I could feel the blood
trick<lb n="c57-0148__main__22"/>ling<del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24687__Start"/>from<del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24687__End"/>
in my
veins – <del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24692__Start"/>The scream<del loc="c57-0148__main__d1e24692__End"/>&
tingling in
my
feet<lb n="c57-0148__main__23"/>This
state lasted but
an
instant
<lb n="c57-0148__main__24"/>the scream was
repeated
& I rushed <lb n="c57-0148__main__25"/>into the
room. Great God
why did I <lb n="c57-0148__main__26"/>not then
expire –
Why
I
am I here to <lb n="c57-0148__main__27"/>relate the destruction of the best
hope <lb n="c57-0148__main__28"/>&the
purest creature of
earth –
She was
<lb n="c57-0148__main__29"/>there –
lifeless &
inanimate –
thrown <lb n="c57-0148__main__30"/>across the
bed
her head hanging
<lb n="c57-0148__main__31"/>down
her pale & distorted features half <lb n="c57-0148__main__32"/>covered by her
hair –
Every where I turn <lb n="c57-0148__main__33"/>I see the same
figure —Her bloodless<lb n="c57-0149__main__1"/>arms
& relaxed
figure
flung by the mur<lb n="c57-0149__main__2"/>derer on its
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>bridal bier —
Could I behold
this &
and
<lb n="c57-0149__main__3"/>live– Alas
life is
obstinate
<del loc="c57-0149__main__d1e24771__Start"/>&
clinging<del loc="c57-0149__main__d1e24771__End"/>it
clings closest where it <lb n="c57-0149__main__4"/>is most
hated–
for a moment only did <lb n="c57-0149__main__5"/>I lose
recollection –
I
fainted.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0149__main__6"/>When
I
recovered
I found myself
in <lb n="c57-0149__main__7"/>the midst of
the people of
inn –
Their <lb n="c57-0149__main__8"/>countenances expressed a breathless
terror
<lb n="c57-0149__main__9"/>but the horror of others appeared
<del loc="c57-0149__main__d1e24795__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0149__main__d1e24795__End"/>only
as a
<lb n="c57-0149__main__10"/>mockery <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>a
shadow of the feelings that oppressed <lb n="c57-0149__main__11"/><lb n="c57-0149__left_margin__1"/>me. I escaped from them
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to
the room where lay the body <lb n="c57-0149__main__12"/>of
Elizabeth –
my
love —
my
wife –
so lately
<lb n="c57-0149__main__13"/>living –
so
dear –so worthy –
She had <lb n="c57-0149__main__14"/>been moved from the posture in <lb n="c57-0149__main__15"/>which I had first beheld
her
&
now
<lb n="c57-0149__main__16"/>as she
lay
her head upon her
arm
<lb n="c57-0149__main__17"/>and
<del loc="c57-0149__main__d1e24852__Start"/>h<del loc="c57-0149__main__d1e24852__End"/>
a
hankerchief
thrown across <lb n="c57-0149__main__18"/>her face &
neck
I might have sup<lb n="c57-0149__main__19"/>posed her
asleep –
I rushed towards
her &<lb n="c57-0149__main__20"/>embraced
her with
ardour
but the
<lb n="c57-0149__main__21"/>deathly
coldness of the
body
told
me
that <lb n="c57-0149__main__22"/>what I now held in my arms had <lb n="c57-0149__main__23"/>ceased to be the Elizabeth whom I <lb n="c57-0149__main__24"/>had loved &
cherished,
the murderous
<lb n="c57-0149__main__25"/>grasp
of the
fiend
was on her
neck
<lb n="c57-0149__main__26"/>& the breath had ceased to issue from <lb n="c57-0149__main__27"/>her
<del loc="c57-0149__main__d1e24885__Start"/>sweet<del loc="c57-0149__main__d1e24885__End"/>
lips.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0149__main__28"/>While I still
held
her
in my arms
<lb n="c57-0149__main__29"/>in the agony of
despair
I happened to <lb n="c57-0149__main__30"/>look up.
The room
<del loc="c57-0149__main__d1e24896__Start"/>which<del loc="c57-0149__main__d1e24896__End"/>
had before <lb n="c57-0149__main__31"/>been
quite dark
and I felt a kind of <lb n="c57-0149__main__32"/>panic on seeing the pale yellow light <lb n="c57-0149__main__33"/>of the moon illuminate the
chamber<lb n="c57-0150__main__1"/>the
shutters had been thrown
back and
with <lb n="c57-0150__main__2"/>a sensation of horror not to be
described
I <lb n="c57-0150__main__3"/>saw at the open window a figure the most <lb n="c57-0150__main__4"/>hideous &
abhorred –
A grin was on the face <lb n="c57-0150__main__5"/>of the
monster. <del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e24924__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e24924__End"/>he
seemed to
jeer
as with <lb n="c57-0150__main__6"/>his fiendish finger he pointed towards the <lb n="c57-0150__main__7"/>corpse of my
wife—I
rushed towards the
window
<lb n="c57-0150__main__8"/>and drawing a pistol from my
bosom –shot–
<lb n="c57-0150__main__9"/>but he eluded
me – <del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e24943__Start"/>he<del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e24943__End"/> leapt
from his
station <lb n="c57-0150__main__10"/>and <del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e24948__Start"/>run<del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e24948__End"/>
running with
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the
swiftness of
lightning
<lb n="c57-0150__main__11"/>plunged
in to
the
lake. The
report of
my
<lb n="c57-0150__main__12"/>pistol brought a
crow<del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e24966__Start"/>e<del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e24966__End"/>d
into the
room
<lb n="c57-0150__main__13"/>I pointed to
where he had
disappeared &<lb n="c57-0150__main__14"/>we
followed
him
with
boats & cast nets
<lb n="c57-0150__main__15"/>but in
vain and
passing several
hours <lb n="c57-0150__main__16"/><del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e24976__Start"/>re<del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e24976__End"/> in the search
returned
hopeless –
Most <lb n="c57-0150__main__17"/>of my companions
believeing
it to have <lb n="c57-0150__main__18"/>been a form conjured
by my fancy.
How<lb n="c57-0150__main__19"/>ever
after having
<del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e24997__Start"/>quitte<del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e24997__End"/> landed
they pro<lb n="c57-0150__main__20"/>ceeded to search the
country <del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e25006__Start"/>goin<del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e25006__End"/>
parties <lb n="c57-0150__main__21"/>going in different directions among the <lb n="c57-0150__main__22"/>woods &
vines.
I did not
accompany
them <lb n="c57-0150__main__23"/>for
the
exhaustion that now seized on <lb n="c57-0150__main__24"/>me
I was
exhausted;
a film covered my
<lb n="c57-0150__main__25"/>eyes
and my skin
<del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e25029__Start"/>burned<del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e25029__End"/>was
parched with
<del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e25036__Start"/>t<del loc="c57-0150__main__d1e25036__End"/>
the heat <lb n="c57-0150__main__26"/>of fever. In this state I
lay
on a
bed
hardly <lb n="c57-0150__main__27"/>conscious of what had
happened &
my eyes <lb n="c57-0150__main__28"/>wandered round the
room
as if to seek
<lb n="c57-0150__main__29"/>somthing
that I had
lost. At
length
I
remem<lb n="c57-0150__main__30"/>bered that my father would anxiously <lb n="c57-0150__main__31"/>expect
the
return
of
Elizabeth &
myself
<lb n="c57-0150__main__32"/>and that I must return alone. This <lb n="c57-0150__main__33"/>reflection brought
tears
into my
eyes
& I <lb n="c57-0150__main__34"/>wept for a long
time. I reflected
on my
<lb n="c57-0150__main__35"/>misfortunes
& their
cause and
was bewildered <lb n="c57-0150__main__36"/>in a cloud of wonder and horror.
The<lb n="c57-0151__main__1"/>death
of William, the execution of
Justine
<lb n="c57-0151__main__2"/>the murder of
Clerval
&
now
of my
wife –
even <lb n="c57-0151__main__3"/><lb n="c57-0151__left_margin__1"/>at that moment I knew not that
my
<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25100__Start"/>my<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25100__End"/> only <lb n="c57-0151__main__4"/>remaining friends were safe from the malignity <lb n="c57-0151__main__5"/>of the
fiend –
my father even now might be <lb n="c57-0151__main__6"/>writhing under his
grasp
& Ernest might be <lb n="c57-0151__main__7"/>dead at his
feet –
This
reflection
made me
<lb n="c57-0151__main__8"/>shudder
and recalled me to action.
<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25114__Start"/>I sta<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25114__End"/>
I <lb n="c57-0151__main__9"/>started
up
& resolved to return to Geneva <lb n="c57-0151__main__10"/>with
<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25123__Start"/>every<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25123__End"/>all
possible
speed. There
were no horses <lb n="c57-0151__main__11"/>to be
procured
and I must return by the
<lb n="c57-0151__main__12"/>lake
but the wind was
<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25137__Start"/>now<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25137__End"/><del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25140__Start"/>against me<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25140__End"/>unfavourable<lb n="c57-0151__main__13"/>and
the rain fell in torrents.
It was
however
<lb n="c57-0151__main__14"/>hardly
yet morning
and I
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>might
reasonably
hope<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25161__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25161__End"/>
to arrive
<lb n="c57-0151__main__15"/><del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25166__Start"/>that ni<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25166__End"/>
by
night –I
hired
a number of
<lb n="c57-0151__main__16"/>men to
row
and took an oar
myself
for <lb n="c57-0151__main__17"/>I had always
<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25175__Start"/>felt<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25175__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>experienced
relief
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>from
mental
<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25196__Start"/>strain<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25196__End"/>
torment in bodily exercise. <lb n="c57-0151__main__18"/>But the overflowing misery I now
felt
<lb n="c57-0151__main__19"/>& the excess of agitation that I
endured
<lb n="c57-0151__main__20"/>rendered me incapable of any
exertion–I
<lb n="c57-0151__main__21"/>threw down the
oar
&
leaning my head <lb n="c57-0151__main__22"/>upon my
hands
gave way to every <lb n="c57-0151__main__23"/>gloomy idea that
arose—If
I looked
up
<lb n="c57-0151__main__24"/>I saw the scenes which were familiar <lb n="c57-0151__main__25"/>to me in my happier
<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25226__Start"/>days<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25226__End"/>time
and which I had <lb n="c57-0151__main__26"/>contemplated but the day
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>before
in the compa<lb n="c57-0151__main__27"/>ny of her who was
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>now
but a shadow & a
<lb n="c57-0151__main__28"/>recollection –
tears streamed from my
<lb n="c57-0151__main__29"/>eyes – I looked on the <del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25268__Start"/>waters<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25268__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>lake<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25279__Start"/>& sa<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25279__End"/>
the <lb n="c57-0151__main__30"/>rain had ceased for a
moment
& I
<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25285__Start"/>saw<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25285__End"/><lb n="c57-0151__main__31"/>saw
the fish play in the waters as
I
<lb n="c57-0151__main__32"/>had done
<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25295__Start"/>the day bef<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25295__End"/> but <del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25299__Start"/>four<del loc="c57-0151__main__d1e25299__End"/>
a few <lb n="c57-0151__main__33"/>hours
before –
they had then been observed by <lb n="c57-0151__main__34"/>Elizabeth. Nothing is so painful to the human <lb n="c57-0151__main__35"/>mind as
great & sudden
change –
The
sun<lb n="c57-0152__main__1"/>might shine
or the clouds might
lower –
but <lb n="c57-0152__main__2"/>nothing could appear to me as it had done the <lb n="c57-0152__main__3"/>day
before – <del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25319__Start"/>Eve<del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25319__End"/>
A fiend had snatched from <lb n="c57-0152__main__4"/>me every hope of future
happiness.
No crea<lb n="c57-0152__main__5"/>ture had ever been so miserable as I
was
<lb n="c57-0152__main__6"/>so frightful an event
was
single
upon <lb n="c57-0152__main__7"/>earth.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0152__main__8"/>But
why should I dwell upon the <lb n="c57-0152__main__9"/>incidents that followed this last over<lb n="c57-0152__main__10"/>whelming
event –
Mine has been a tale
<lb n="c57-0152__main__11"/>horrors–
I have
<del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25351__Start"/>now<del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25351__End"/>
reached their
ac<del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25354__Start"/>h<del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25354__End"/>me
<lb n="c57-0152__main__12"/>and what I must now relate can but <lb n="c57-0152__main__13"/>be tedious to
you now that
one by
one
<lb n="c57-0152__main__14"/>my friends were snatched
away &
I was <lb n="c57-0152__main__15"/>left desolate. My own strength is
exhausted
<lb n="c57-0152__main__16"/>& I must
tell
in
few
words
What remains <lb n="c57-0152__main__17"/>of my hideous narration.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0152__main__18"/>I arrived at Geneva. My
fathe &<lb n="c57-0152__main__19"/>Ernest
yet
lived
but the former
was <lb n="c57-0152__main__20"/>unable to bear
the
miserable
tidings <lb n="c57-0152__main__21"/>that I
bore —
I see him
now
excellent <lb n="c57-0152__main__22"/>& venerable old
man –
his eyes wandered <lb n="c57-0152__main__23"/>in
vacancy
for they had lost their <lb n="c57-0152__main__24"/>charm &
delight – his neice
his more <lb n="c57-0152__main__25"/>than
daughter
whom he doated on <lb n="c57-0152__main__26"/>with all
the
affection
of
a man
who
<lb n="c57-0152__main__27"/>in the decline of
life
having few
affec<lb n="c57-0152__main__28"/>tions
clings
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>more
earnestly to those that remain.
Cursed
<lb n="c57-0152__main__29"/>Cursed be the fiend that brought misery <lb n="c57-0152__main__30"/>on his grey
hairs
& doomed him to
<del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25423__Start"/>die<del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25423__End"/><lb n="c57-0152__left_margin__1"/>waste<lb n="c57-0152__main__31"/>in <del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25436__Start"/>misery<del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25436__End"/> w<del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25439__Start"/>h<del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25439__End"/>retchedness.
He could not live <lb n="c57-0152__main__32"/>under the horrors that were accumu<lb n="c57-0152__main__33"/>lated
round him –
An
applapetic
fit
was
<lb n="c57-0152__main__34"/>brought
on
& in a few
<del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25455__Start"/>hours<del loc="c57-0152__main__d1e25455__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>days
he
died<lb n="c57-0153__main__1"/>in
my
arms<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0153__main__2"/>What
then became of me? I know
<lb n="c57-0153__main__3"/>not—I
lost
sensation
& chains & darkness were <lb n="c57-0153__main__4"/><lb n="c57-0153__left_margin__1"/>the only objects that pressed upon
me – some <lb n="c57-0153__main__5"/>times indeed
I
dreamed
that I wandered <lb n="c57-0153__main__6"/>in flowery meadows & pleasant vales with <lb n="c57-0153__main__7"/>the friends of my
youth –
But
I
awoke &<lb n="c57-0153__main__8"/>found
myself in a dungeon. Melancholy
<lb n="c57-0153__main__9"/>followed
but by degrees I
regained
a clear <lb n="c57-0153__main__10"/>conception of my miseries &
situation &<lb n="c57-0153__main__11"/>was
then released from my prison. For <lb n="c57-0153__main__12"/>they had called me
mad &<del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25507__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25507__End"/>During
many
<lb n="c57-0153__main__13"/>months
as I
understood
a solitary <lb n="c57-0153__main__14"/>cell had been my
habitation. – But I <lb n="c57-0153__main__15"/>might now wander freely But
liberty
<lb n="c57-0153__main__16"/><del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25528__Start"/>was a<del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25528__End"/><lb n="c57-0153__left_margin__1"/>had
been
a
useless gift to
me
had
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>I not
as I a<lb n="c57-0153__main__17"/>wakened to
reason <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>at
the same time
<del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25567__Start"/>been<del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25567__End"/>
awakened to
vengeance.
<lb n="c57-0153__main__18"/>As
<del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25573__Start"/>pa<del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25573__End"/>
the memory of past misfortunes
<lb n="c57-0153__main__19"/>prest
upon
me
I began to
<del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25579__Start"/>f<del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25579__End"/>
reflect <lb n="c57-0153__main__20"/><lb n="c57-0153__left_margin__1"/>on their
cause – The
monster whom I had
<lb n="c57-0153__main__21"/>created—the
miserable dæmon whom <lb n="c57-0153__main__22"/>I had sent
abroard in
the world for my
des<lb n="c57-0153__main__23"/>truction —
I was possessed by a
madening
<lb n="c57-0153__main__24"/>rage when I thought of
him
and desired <lb n="c57-0153__main__25"/>& ardently prayed that I might have him <lb n="c57-0153__main__26"/>within my grasp to wreak a great
&sig<lb n="c57-0153__main__27"/>nal<del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25632__Start"/>vengeance<del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25632__End"/>revenge
on his cursed head.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0153__main__28"/>Nor did my hate long confine its<lb n="c57-0153__main__29"/>elf to useless wishes; I began to reflect on <lb n="c57-0153__main__30"/>the best means of securing
him
& for <lb n="c57-0153__main__31"/>this
purpose
about a month after my
<lb n="c57-0153__main__32"/>release
I repaired to a criminal judge <lb n="c57-0153__main__33"/>in the
town
& told him that I had an accu<lb n="c57-0153__main__34"/>sation to
make,
that I knew the destroyer <lb n="c57-0153__main__35"/>of my
family
and that I required him <lb n="c57-0153__main__36"/>to exert his whole authority for
<del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25679__Start"/>his<del loc="c57-0153__main__d1e25679__End"/>theappre<lb n="c57-0154__main__1"/>hension
of the murderer.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0154__main__2"/>The magistrate listened
<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25703__Start"/>to<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25703__End"/>
to me with
at<lb n="c57-0154__main__3"/>tention& kindness – Be
assured,
sir,
said
he no
pains <lb n="c57-0154__main__4"/>or exertions on my part
<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25717__Start"/>sha<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25717__End"/> have been or
<lb n="c57-0154__main__5"/>shall be spared to discover the
<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25725__Start"/>wretch<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25725__End"/>villain<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0154__main__6"/>I
thank
you, I replied, listen therefore
to <lb n="c57-0154__main__7"/><lb n="c57-0154__left_margin__1"/>the
<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25752__Start"/>tale<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25752__End"/>deposition
I have to
<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25761__Start"/>relate<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25761__End"/>make. <del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25768__Start"/>which<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25768__End"/>
It is
a
indeed a <lb n="c57-0154__main__8"/>tale so
<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25773__Start"/>wonderf<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25773__End"/> strange
that I
fear you would <lb n="c57-0154__main__9"/>not credit
it
were there not
somthing
in <lb n="c57-0154__main__10"/>truth
which
however
wonderful
forces <lb n="c57-0154__main__11"/>conviction. The story is too connected to be mis<lb n="c57-0154__main__12"/>taken for a
dream
& I have no motive <lb n="c57-0154__main__13"/>for
falsehood.
My
manner
as I
said this <lb n="c57-0154__main__14"/><del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25796__Start"/>wals<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25796__End"/>
was
impressive
but calm; I had formed <lb n="c57-0154__main__15"/>in my own heart
the
resolution to pursue <lb n="c57-0154__main__16"/>my destroyer to
death
& this purpose quieted <lb n="c57-0154__main__17"/>my
agony &<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>provisionally
reconciled me to life. I now <lb n="c57-0154__main__18"/>related my
history
briefly
but with firmness <lb n="c57-0154__main__19"/>&
precision –
marking
dates with
accuracy
<lb n="c57-0154__main__20"/>and never deviating into invective or
<lb n="c57-0154__main__21"/>exclamation. The
magistrate appeared at <lb n="c57-0154__main__22"/>first perfectly
incredulous
but as I con<lb n="c57-0154__main__23"/>tinued he became
<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25833__Start"/>be<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25833__End"/>
more attentive
&<lb n="c57-0154__main__24"/>interrested –I
saw him sometimes shudder <lb n="c57-0154__main__25"/>with horror, at others a lively
surprise <lb n="c57-0154__main__26"/>unmi<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25851__Start"/>xed<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25851__End"/>ngled
with
disbelief
was painted <lb n="c57-0154__main__27"/>on his
countenance. When
I had concluded <lb n="c57-0154__main__28"/>my
<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25862__Start"/>relation
I<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25862__End"/>
narration I said.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0154__main__29"/>This
is the being whom I
accuse
<lb n="c57-0154__main__30"/>and for whose
detection
& punishment <lb n="c57-0154__main__31"/>I call upon you to exert your whole
power
<lb n="c57-0154__main__32"/>It is your duty as a
magist<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>rate
and <lb n="c57-0154__main__33"/>I believe & hope
your feelings as a man
<lb n="c57-0154__main__34"/>do
not revolt from the execution <lb n="c57-0154__main__35"/>of
<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25910__Start"/>your<del loc="c57-0154__main__d1e25910__End"/>those
functions on this
occasion.—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0154__main__36"/>This
address caused a
considerable<lb n="c57-0155__main__1"/>change
in the
phisiognomy
of my
auditor
<lb n="c57-0155__main__2"/>He had heard my
<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e25933__Start"/>tale<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e25933__End"/>story
with that half kind of belief <lb n="c57-0155__main__3"/>that is given to a tale of spirits and
ghosts
but <lb n="c57-0155__main__4"/>when he was called upon to act officially in
<lb n="c57-0155__main__5"/>consequence of it <del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e25953__Start"/>his<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e25953__End"/>
the whole tide of his incre<lb n="c57-0155__main__6"/>dulity
returned – He however
answered
mildly.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0155__main__7"/>I
would willingly afford you every aid in <lb n="c57-0155__main__8"/>your pursuit; but the creature of whom you <lb n="c57-0155__main__9"/>speak appears to have powers which would <lb n="c57-0155__main__10"/>put all my exertions to
defiance <del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e25973__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e25973__End"/>
Who <lb n="c57-0155__main__11"/>can follow an animal
<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e25981__Start"/>who<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e25981__End"/>which
can traverse
<lb n="c57-0155__main__12"/><del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e25989__Start"/>se<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e25989__End"/>
the sea of
ice
and inhabit caves &
dens
<lb n="c57-0155__main__13"/>where no man would venture to
intrude<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0155__main__14"/>But such a wretch, I replied, may be hun<lb n="c57-0155__main__15"/>ted like the Chamois & be destroyed like a <lb n="c57-0155__main__16"/>beast of prey.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0155__main__17"/>Certainly; but some months have <lb n="c57-0155__main__18"/>elapsed since the commission<lb n="c57-0155__main__19"/>besides
some months have elapsed since <lb n="c57-0155__main__20"/>the commission of his
crimes &<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26021__Start"/>wh<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26021__End"/>
no one
<lb n="c57-0155__main__21"/>may
conjecture to what place he has
<lb n="c57-0155__main__22"/>wandered
or what
<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26037__Start"/>country<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26037__End"/>region
he may now
<lb n="c57-0155__main__23"/>inhabit.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0155__main__24"/>I
do not
doubt, I replied,
that he hovers <lb n="c57-0155__main__25"/>near the
<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26055__Start"/>place where<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26055__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>spot
which I
<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26068__Start"/>live<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26068__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>inhabit –
And if he <lb n="c57-0155__main__26"/>has indeed taken refuge in the
alps
he <lb n="c57-0155__main__27"/>may be hunted like the
chamois &des<lb n="c57-0155__main__28"/>troyed
as a beast of prey. But I perceive <lb n="c57-0155__main__29"/>your
thoughts —
you do not credit my
<lb n="c57-0155__main__30"/>narrative
and do not intend to
<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26094__Start"/>inflict<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26094__End"/><lb n="c57-0155__main__31"/>pursue
my enemy with the punishment
<lb n="c57-0155__main__32"/>that <del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26105__Start"/>h<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26105__End"/>
is his
desert.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0155__main__33"/>As
I
spoke
rage sparkled in my
<lb n="c57-0155__main__34"/>eyes –
The magistrate was
intimidated <lb n="c57-0155__main__35"/>You
are
mistaken,
said
he <del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26118__Start"/>an<del loc="c57-0155__main__d1e26118__End"/> I
will <lb n="c57-0155__main__36"/>exert
myself
and if it is
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>in
my power to <lb n="c57-0155__main__37"/>seize the
monster
be assured that
he<lb n="c57-0156__main__1"/>shall
suffer punishment proportionate to <lb n="c57-0156__main__2"/>his
crimes –
But I
fear
from what you
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>haveyour<lb n="c57-0156__main__3"/>self
described to
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>be
his
properties
that this will <lb n="c57-0156__main__4"/>prove
impracticable
and
that —
while every <lb n="c57-0156__main__5"/>proper measure is
pursued
you should
<lb n="c57-0156__main__6"/>endeavour to
make up your mind to
a <lb n="c57-0156__main__7"/>disappointment<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0156__main__8"/>That
cannot
be– said I wildly—But
<lb n="c57-0156__main__9"/><lb n="c57-0156__left_margin__1"/>all that I can say
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>will
be of little
avail; <del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26224__Start"/>vengeance<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26224__End"/><lb n="c57-0156__main__10"/><lb n="c57-0156__left_margin__1"/>My
revenge is of no moment to
you yet
while I allow <lb n="c57-0156__main__11"/>it to
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>be
a
vice
I confess that it is the <lb n="c57-0156__main__12"/>devouring & only passion of my
soul;
my <lb n="c57-0156__main__13"/>rage is
unspeakable
when I reflect that <lb n="c57-0156__main__14"/>the
murderer
whom I have turned loose <lb n="c57-0156__main__15"/>upon
society
still
exists – I trembled as I spoke <lb n="c57-0156__main__16"/>this
You refuse my just
demand –
I have <lb n="c57-0156__main__17"/>but one
resource
and I devote
myself
<lb n="c57-0156__main__18"/>either in my life or
death
to his
destruc<lb n="c57-0156__main__19"/>tion – <del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26277__Start"/>I will pursue him<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26277__End"/> I
trembled <lb n="c57-0156__main__20"/>with excess of agitation as I said
this
<lb n="c57-0156__main__21"/>there was <del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26284__Start"/>a<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26284__End"/>
frenzy
in my
manner
<lb n="c57-0156__main__22"/>&
something
I doubt
not
of that <lb n="c57-0156__main__23"/>haughty
fierceness
<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26297__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26297__End"/>which
the martyrs of <lb n="c57-0156__main__24"/>old
were
said to have
possessed —
But
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to
a
<lb n="c57-0156__main__25"/>Genev<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26324__Start"/>ese<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26324__End"/>an
magistrate, whose mind was <lb n="c57-0156__main__26"/>occupied by far other ideas than
<lb n="c57-0156__main__27"/><del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26334__Start"/>tho<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26334__End"/>
those of
devo<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26337__Start"/>te<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26337__End"/>tion &<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26341__Start"/>heh<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26341__End"/> heroism <del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26344__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26344__End"/><lb n="c57-0156__main__28"/>this
elevation of mind had much the <lb n="c57-0156__main__29"/>appearance of madness. He endeavoured <lb n="c57-0156__main__30"/>to
<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26353__Start"/>calm<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26353__End"/>
soothe me as a nurse does <lb n="c57-0156__main__31"/>a
child
& reverted to my tale as the <lb n="c57-0156__main__32"/>effects of
delirium — Man –
I cried,
how
<lb n="c57-0156__main__33"/>ignorant art thou in thy pride of
<lb n="c57-0156__main__34"/>wisdom.– cease
you know not what
<lb n="c57-0156__main__35"/><del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26366__Start"/>you speak about<del loc="c57-0156__main__d1e26366__End"/>
it is you
say.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0156__main__36"/>I
broke from the house
&
angry &<lb n="c57-0156__main__37"/>disturbed
retired to meditate
some other mode <lb n="c57-0156__main__38"/>of action.
